title: mihaiadrian21
author: mihaiadrian21
content: It is looking for candlestick patterns indicating dips and generates a buy signal. It is currently working on Binance and Kraken. Kraken bot is turned off for now but I can turn it on if any of you are interested.You can see it here: https://t.me/BitAssistPS. note that the buy price is always 0.2% higher than the best bid price. This is just a trick to get cornix to buy the market price.PS2. if anyone wants to help with development, hit me up on Telegram

It is currently working on Binance and Kraken. Kraken bot is turned off for now but I can turn it on if any of you are interested.Can you please share in detail about the functioning of the bot that you're trying to promote. On which time duration the bot looks for candlestick pattern? I guess your bot works based on the available API of those exchanges and if yes then what type of pattern it looks for before generating a buy signal? I think if your bot is good enough then it may be used for DCA strategy and that way the ones who want to invest in Bitcoin by following the DCA strategy may get some help in the form of that bot. I don't really rely on bots myself but the way you described your bot seems good to me and it could be helpful for some people. I would also like to know that are you going to make the bot open-source or not?

comments.author: Vispilio
comments.body: Good attempt, I'll be on the look out for your future results. 1 initial caveat is that it's better to test most of the pairs first rather than indiscriminately running your criteria for all of them on Binance, most tokens have their own unique dynamics that are not in harmony with any technical analysis. You might want to stick to just several pairs that yield better results at first, and tweak your parameters according to volatility and other criteria for some of the others. Would be great if you can indicate some historical results too in that link you shared, as well as making a mention of any updates you make to your code going forward. Good Luck
